items.title: SF ramps up mobile COVID-19 testing to target resources to hardest hit communities
items.summary: The new mobile testing vans are part of a strategy to be able to rapidly expand or contract testing as needed as the high-capacity 7th and Brannan test site closes on March 31.

items.title: Homeless deaths doubled in SF during first year of pandemic, mostly from drug overdoses
items.summary: COVID-19 caused no deaths among people experiencing homelessness, but the pandemic reduced contact with substance use services.

items.title: SF will no longer require proof of vaccination or a negative test to enter certain indoor public settings
items.summary: Individual businesses may choose to be more restrictive than SF's guidelines; requirements remain in effect for indoor “mega” events of over 1,000 people.
